pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Analysis of Spatial Data Using a Unifying Spatial Fusion Framework // Multivariate modelling of geostatistical (point), lattice (areal) and point pattern data in a unifying spatial fusion framework. Details are given in Wang and Furrer (2019) arXiv:1906.00364. Model inference is done using either 'Stan' https://mc-stan.org/ or 'INLA' http://www.r-inla.org.
